thread.title: iPhone 6S winner: Photographer Lisa Bettany compares every iPhone camera in ultimate test | DailyTelegraph
thread.title_full: iPhone 6S winner: Photographer Lisa Bettany compares every iPhone camera in ultimate test | DailyTelegraph

author: Rod Chester
title: iPhone 6S winner: Photographer Lisa Bettany compares every iPhone camera in ultimate test | DailyTelegraph
text:
THIS is the ultimate test of the iPhone camera.
Photographer Lisa Bettany , who created the filters for the iPhone photographer app Camera+ which has long been a top-seller in the app store, put the 12 megapixel camera in the iPhone 6S to the test.
In a series of side-by-side shots, Bettany took identical images so you can see the differences.
Other Stories Partner explains why Thurston broke down Nrl 0 comments ‘I got three or four words in’ Us Sports Wayne trait that other coaches can’t stomach Nrl 0 comments Suburbs most at risk of mortgage default News 0 comments Watmough baby ‘beats the odds’ Sydney Confidential 0 comments Lana and Sarah live it up in Bali Sydney Confidential 0 comments On a wide scale, the change in the ability of the camera since the first iPhone was launched is stunning.
But looking at the details, and it’s clear that Apple has done a lot more than just added a better sensor to the new iPhone 6S.
LIVE PHOTOS: This is the killer feature in the iPhone 6S
The difference in colour separation between the iPhone 6, which is the world’s most popular camera, and the iPhone 6S is dramatic. The new camera is clearer and the images have far less noise.
Apple highlighted the abilities of the camera in the iPhone 6 with the popular “Shot on iPhone 6” campaign which used images shot by ordinary iPhone users in advertising and billboards around the world. (Disclaimer: one of my photographs featured in that campaign.) It’s not yet clear if it plans to extend the campaign with the iPhone 6S.
“Each year I do this comparison, and each year I am impressed at how much the iPhone camera technology has improved,” Bettany says in summary to her test.
How does the #iPhone6s camera compare to every other iPhone generation? http://t.co/Z8aVLaZqcp pic.twitter.com/WmJKohJMHh
— Lisa Bettany (@mostlylisa) September 28, 2015 “The iPhone has made it easier to capture and share our memories. Each new phone gives us a better tool to capture better quality images and create incredible photographs.
“The improved sensor, software updates and new A9 processor on the iPhone 6s has made this camera the best yet. There is an apparent increase in the speed of auto focus and improvements to colour accuracy, details and sharpness, especially in low light.”
The proof is in the pudding. To appreciate the capabilities in the new iPhone 6S camera, check out Lisa Bettany’s test .
Originally published as How good is the iPhone camera?
